entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

entry.title: tag
entry.content:
Tag Plugins

In order to make special style contents, Tag Plugin is supported in Hexo. --> This extents the markdown grammar.

Following tags are provided by Hexo:

  • Centered Quote
  • Note
  • Tabs
  • PDF
  • Mermaid
  • Label
  • Video
  • Button
  • Caniuse
  • Group Pictures
  • Link Grid

All the tages will be illustrated by showing the code and giving an example.

Centered Quote

Code

{% centerquote %}Something{% endcenterquote %}
<!-- Tag Alias -->
{% cq %}Something{% endcq %}

Example

Something

Something

Note

Code

{% note [class] [no-icon] %}
Any content (suppory inline tags)
{% endnote %}

[class]   : default | primary | success | info | warning | danger.
[no-icon] : disable icon in note

Parameters are optional

Examples

  1. Pure

    {% note %}
    ### Header
    (No style)
    {% endnote %}

    Header

    (No style)

  2. Default

    {% note default %}
    ### Default
    with some texts
    {% endnote %}

    Default

    with some texts

  3. Primary

    Primary

    with some texts

  4. Info

    Info

    with some texts

  5. Success

    Success

    with some texts

  6. Warning

    Warning

    with some texts

  7. Danger

    Danger

    with some texts

Tabs

Code

<!--ï¿¼14-->

Unique name   : Unique name of tabs block tag without comma.
                Will be used in #id's as prefix for each tab with their index numbers.
                If there are whitespaces in name, for generate #id all whitespaces will replaced by dashes.
                Only for current url of post/page must be unique!
[index]       : Index number of active tab.
                If not specified, first tab (1) will be selected.
                If index is -1, no tab will be selected. It's will be something like spoiler.
                Optional parameter.
[Tab caption] : Caption of current tab.
                If not caption specified, unique name with tab index suffix will be used as caption of tab.
                If not caption specified, but specified icon, caption will empty.
                Optional parameter.
[@icon]       : FontAwesome icon name (without 'fa-' at the begining).
                Can be specified with or without space; e.g. 'Tab caption @icon' similar to 'Tab caption@icon'.
                Optional parameter.
